resources.string: A popular Italian aperitif made with Aperol, Prosecco, and a splash of soda water, garnished with an orange slice.
A refreshing Italian cocktail made with Prosecco and peach purée or peach nectar, served in a champagne flute.
A savory cocktail made with vodka, tomato juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauces, and various spices, often garnished with celery and a lemon wedge.
A vibrant cocktail made with vodka, blue curaçao, lemonade, and sometimes lemon-lime soda, served over ice.
A Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça (a sugarcane spirit), lime, and sugar, muddled together and served over ice.
A vibrant cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice, often served in a martini glass with a lime wedge.
A simple and refreshing cocktail made with white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup, often served straight up or on the rocks.
A caffeinated cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and simple syrup, served in a martini glass.
A champagne cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and topped with champagne, served in a flute glass.
A simple and refreshing cocktail made with gin, tonic water, and a slice of lime, served over ice.
A potent cocktail made with vodka, rum, tequila, gin, triple sec, sour mix, and a splash of cola, garnished with a lemon wedge.
A Polynesian-inspired cocktail made with rum, lime juice, orgeat syrup, and orange liqueur, often garnished with mint and a cherry.
A popular Mexican cocktail made with tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and often served with a salt rim.
A classic cocktail made with gin and dry vermouth, typically garnished with an olive or lemon twist.
A refreshing Southern cocktail made with bourbon, mint leaves, sugar, and crushed ice, traditionally served in a silver or pewter cup.
A refreshing Cuban cocktail made with white rum, lime juice, fresh mint leaves, sugar, and soda water.
A zesty cocktail made with vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice, typically served in a copper mug.
A classic Italian cocktail made with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, garnished with an orange peel.
A timeless cocktail made with whiskey, sugar, bitters, and a citrus peel garnish, often served over ice.
A refreshing Mexican cocktail made with tequila, grapefruit soda (such as Jarritos or Squirt), lime juice, and sometimes a salt rim.
A tropical cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, typically blended with ice until smooth.
A classic New Orleans cocktail made with rye whiskey, absinthe, Peychauds Bitters, and a sugar cube, garnished with a lemon twist.
A sophisticated cocktail made with brandy, orange liqueur, lemon juice, and sometimes sugar, served in a sugar-rimmed glass.
A fruity cocktail made with gin, cherry liqueur, triple sec, pineapple juice, lime juice, and grenadine, garnished with a cherry and a slice of pineapple.
A visually striking cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, and grenadine syrup, creating a gradient effect resembling a sunrise.
A classic cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, and soda water, garnished with a lemon slice and a cherry.
A creamy cocktail made with vodka, coffee liqueur (such as Kahlúa), and cream or milk, served over ice.
A classic cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup, sometimes garnished with a cherry and an orange slice.
